name: photo-of-the-day-june-11-2008-3
title: Photo Of The Day: June 11, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: File this under “Things We Didn’t Expect To See During CMApocalypse.” Or ever, really. Twitterer @milesprice probably had to do a double-take when he passed this thing on the road. Could it be John Rich’s new ride? Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
contentEncoded:
File this under “Things We Didn’t Expect To See During CMApocalypse.” Or ever, really. Twitterer @milesprice probably had to do a double-take when he passed this thing on the road. Could it be John Rich’s new ride?

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
